Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Miss Luna, we have fully investigated Venus Splash Park.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "According to that scar-faced man, that place should be Shome's final destination. But...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Worry not. He has no reason to lie about this. A non-fatal betrayal is pointless.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Very well. Then we shall begin making preparations.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna lightly chuckled, interrupting Roland.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Before you begin, there is someone that requires our attention.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna lightly tapped the screen next to her seat several times. A connection was made.'}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: 'Thank you for waiting, my fellow colleagues.'}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: "These are the coordinates of Shome's current facility. Happy hunting to you all."}
{3: "With the transmission of the middle-aged man's voice, the terminal screen flickeredâ€”a huge red mark pointing to the middle of a desert in North America."}
{3: 'With the coordinates confirmed, Luna cut off the connection.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'What is it that you wish for, Miss Luna?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'We want Shome dead, by hook or by crook. But we have to destroy all of his trump cards and research materials before he dies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Covet that which shan't be coveted, and be prepared to go through fire and water.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Listening eagerly, Roland raised his chain blade. He looked excitedly at the seated Luna.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Which is why, I need you and Gabriel to drive this rat out of his hole.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'To allow him a soundless death is mercy. He will attend his own funeral at the place and time of our choosing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'And when that time comes, you will have plenty of time to play your game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Of course. That must wait until after we achieve our goals. Do you understand?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna speaks lightly, but the Ascendants present can instantly feel the oppression in her words. Anyone who hears cannot help but obey.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland & Gabriel', 3: 'We do, Miss Luna.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Good. After you two confirm that Shome has departed, Alpha will make sure no one comes to intercept Shome on his way to the stage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Until then, set up the hunting grounds, and wait quietly.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's words echoed in the empty Ascendant base. A few seconds later, the scenery behind Roland and Gabriel distorted."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Very well. We shall split up and meet at Venus Splash Park.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '...Let the curtains fall in the land of your childhood, Shome.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory207.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I can see the isle the park is on.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Phew, guess we're finally here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Gabriel's words remove Roland from his reminiscence. Roland returns his gaze from the sea and to the so-called speedboat he is on."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I never thought you had a penchant for modding. This thing runs fast. Though, the shape is quite... questionable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Function over form. This thing can even be used as a mobile arsenal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Press this button, and it will run on the current route and detonate when it hits the target.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Okay, that's more than I need to know. I have no plans of going on an explosive lover's leap with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "The phrase lover's leap is inaccurate. According to the books...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Oh, yes, yes. You are just dull as dishwater, my man.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Enough bantering. Let's go ashore. We still have to set the stage.", 4: '1'}
